io.ddf.facades

Class MLFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.ddf.facades.MLFacade
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IHandleDDFFunctionalGroup, ISupportML

    public class MLFacade
extends Object
implements ISupportML
    A helper class to group together the various ML functions that would otherwise crowd up DDF.java

      • train

        public IModel train(String trainMethodName,
           Object... params)
             throws DDFException
        Description copied from interface: ISupportML
        Runs a training algorithm on the entire DDF dataset. If the algorithm is unsupervised, all columns are considered to be features. If the algorithm is supervised, the last column is considered to be the target column
        Specified by:
        train in interface ISupportML
        Returns:
        Throws:
        DDFException

             boolean hasLabels,
             boolean includeFeatures)
               throws DDFException
        Specified by:
        applyModel in interface ISupportML
        hasLabels - if true, then the DDF does include a label column
        includeFeatures - if true, then the output should include all the feature columns
